mapper.insert: insert into BOT_MEDIA (ID, NODE_ID, REQUEST_ID, RESPONSE_MESSAGE_ID, ORG_ID, SERVER_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_TYPE, FILE_SIZE, RECOGNITION_ID, RECOGNITION_TEXT, CORRECTION_TEXT, CORRECTION_DATE, OSS_KEY, MEDIA_ID, MEDIA_TYPE, DURATION, CREATION_DATE, MODIFICATION_DATE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{requestId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{responseMessageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recognitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recognitionText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{correctionText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{correctionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ossKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediaType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update BOT_MEDIA
NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RESPONSE_MESSAGE_ID = #{responseMessageId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERVER_ID = #{serverId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_TYPE = #{fileType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RECOGNITION_ID = #{recognitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECOGNITION_TEXT = #{recognitionText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CORRECTION_TEXT = #{correctionText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CORRECTION_DATE = #{correctionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OSS_KEY = #{ossKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIA_ID = #{mediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIA_TYPE = #{mediaType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DURATION = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update BOT_MEDIA set NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RESPONSE_MESSAGE_ID = #{responseMessageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SERVER_ID = #{serverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_TYPE = #{fileType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECOGNITION_ID = #{recognitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECOGNITION_TEXT = #{recognitionText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORRECTION_TEXT = #{correctionText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORRECTION_DATE = #{correctionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OSS_KEY = #{ossKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIA_ID = #{mediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIA_TYPE = #{mediaType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DURATION = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOT_MEDIA WHERE FILE_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT #{first},#{pageSize}
SELECT * FROM BOT_MEDIA WHERE CREATION_DATE >= #{lastCreateTime} AND FILE_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM BOT_MEDIA WHERE CORRECTION_DATE >= #{lastUpdateTime} AND FILE_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY MODIFICATION_DATE LIMIT #{first }, #{pageSize};
SELECT * FROM BOT_MEDIA WHERE CORRECTION_DATE > CREATION_DATE AND FILE_TYPE = 2 LIMIT #{first }, #{pageSize};
